title: Flower Planting With No Adjacent - Graph - Easy - LeetCode
content:
You have n gardens, labeled from 1 to n, and an array paths where paths[i] = [xi, yi] describes the existence of a bidirectional path from garden xi to garden yi. In each garden, you want to plant one of 4 types of flowers.

title: Find the Town Judge - Tree - Easy - LeetCode
content:
In a town, there are N people labelled from 1 to N.  There is a rumor that one of these people is secretly the town judge. If the town judge exists, then: The town judge trusts nobody.

title: Matrix Cells in Distance Order - Sort - Easy - LeetCode
content:
We are given a matrix with R rows and C columns has cells with integer coordinates (r, c), where 0 <= r < R and 0 <= c < C.
Additionally, we are given a cell in that matrix with coordinates (r0, c0).
